akn:section.akn:heading: Authority to issue electronic duck stamps

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 718p. Authority to issue electronic duck stamps(a) In generalThe Secretary may authorize any State to issue electronic stamps in accordance with this subchapter.
(b) ConsultationThe Secretary shall implement this section in consultation with State management agencies.
(Pub. L. 113–239, § 3, Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2848.)
(a) In general The Secretary may authorize any State to issue electronic stamps in accordance with this subchapter.
(b) Consultation The Secretary shall implement this section in consultation with State management agencies.
